snippet.title: Be Hero - Early Access Trailer (english)
snippet.description:
Be Hero is a farming/crafting RPG about an aspiring hero who arrived late to the final battle and needs to work in a tavern to be able to return home.

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1299790/Be_Hero/

TRAILER CREDITS:
Music by Fernando Nicknich
Video Edition by Richarley Menescal
